hadiths.text: Narrated AbuHurayrah: A man asked the Prophet (ﷺ) whether one who was fasting could embrace (his wife) and he gave him permission; but when another man came to him, and asked him, he forbade him. The one to whom he gave permission was an old man and the one whom he forbade was a youth

chapter.eng-name: That It Is Disliked For In The Case Of A Young Person (While Fasting)
